9. Dutiyaduṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṃ

391. Tena
samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantā addasaṃsu chagalakaṃ chakalakaṃ (syā.) ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṃ. Disvāna
evamāhaṃsu – ‘‘handa mayaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ chagalakaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karoma. Imaṃ ajikaṃ mettiyaṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ karoma. Evaṃ mayaṃ voharissāma. Pubbe mayaṃ, āvuso, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ sutena avocumhā. Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṃ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto’’ti. Te taṃ chagalakaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma
akaṃsu. Taṃ ajikaṃ mettiyaṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ akaṃsu. Te bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesuṃ – ‘‘pubbe mayaṃ, āvuso, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ sutena avocumhā. Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṃ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto’’ti. Bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu – ‘‘māvuso, evaṃ avacuttha. Nāyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṃ karissatī’’ti.
